name: NIREEKSHANA ACET INDIA
briefDescription: *Counseling & free medical care for 800 HIV positives including 200 children each month & two community clinics reaching an additional 250 HIV positives in Hyderabad; *Two satellite programs in Visakhapatnam & Hubli reaching 200 HIV positives & their families; *Hospital & home based care to 30 families in Dimapur; *Skill training & rehabilitation of about 100 AIDS widows; *Educational support to 50 HIV infected & 200 HIV affected children each month; *150 AIDS prevention seminars/training annually reaching about 5000 individuals in communities; *Adolescent sex education, prevention of abuse & trafficking in 50 schools reaching 5000 boys & girls annually; *Clinical/ basic research in HIV,TB, leprosy & diseases of poverty.
